DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess role MET inhibitor maintenance treatment adult patient extensive stage small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: TIvantinib Maintenance Treatment Extended Small-cell Lung Cancer ( TIMES )
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm extensivestage SCLC Disease control first line platinum/etoposide treatment ECOG performance status 0 1 Measurable disease accord RECIST Version 1.1 criterion Adequate bone marrow , liver , renal function . Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded ( FFPE ) freeze tumor tissue material must available . Resolution toxic effect prior therapy accord NCI CTCAE , v 4.0 Full recovery significant complication surgery If childbearing age , use doublebarrier contraceptive measure , oral abstain sexual intercourse study 90 day last dose chemotherapy Negative pregnancy test within 72 hour prior initiation study treatment , childbearing potential Signed inform consent prior begin protocol specific procedures Patients must available treatment followup Previous therapy Tivantinib know cMET inhibitor Radiotherapy target lesion major surgical procedure within 4 week , prior inclusion study Palliative radiotherapy within 2 week prior inclusion study History malignancy past five year , exclude basal cell cervix , prostate cancer value prostatespecific antigen < 0.2 ng / mL History cardiac disease Known human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) infection Pregnant lactate woman childbearing/reproductive potential use adequate contraception Need breastfeed within 12 week completion study Gastrointestinal disorder may interfere absorption Tivantinib Inability unwillingness swallow complete dos Tivantinib Any known contraindication treatment significant comorbid condition could jeopardize participation study
